wp:term.wp:term_description: The capital city of England and the United Kingdom. It is the most populous city in the United Kingdom, with a metropolitan area of over 13 million inhabitants. Standing on the River Thames, London has been a major settlement for two millennia, its history going back to its founding by the Romans, who named it Londinium. London's ancient core, the City of London, largely retains its 1.12-square-mile (2.9 km2) mediaeval boundaries and in 2011 had a resident population of 7,375, making it the smallest city in England.

The most populous city of France. Situated on the Seine River, in the north of the country, it is at the heart of the Île-de-France region. The city's municipality (the 20 arrondissements) had a population of 2,243,833 in 2010, while its urban agglomeration, the most populous in the European Union, had more than 10 million inhabitants.

item.title: Zara Fling
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
Zara is a Marketing and Sales Specialist and has lived and worked all over the world, representing some of the largest property companies.
She has over five years’ experience providing acquisition services in the UK investment property, prime and super prime London acquisitions. With a total of more than 15 years property experience Zara is Head of our Private Clients and is very much hands on.
Clients looking for Off Market Property in London, UK Investment advice and Global Property Portfolio building will find her open, easy approach and negotiating skills invaluable.
Zara has a passion for New Build Projects and International Resort Development.

Marco has a passion for New Build Projects and International Resort Development.

item.title: Westminster Beauty
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
This is an example of a single property using a boxed layout with a property image slideshow. From the Theme Option Panel you can set the default property layout to full width or boxed. Which can be overwritten on a property basis. A click on the active property photo will open it in full screen mode.

Single Property Layouts

  • "Full Width" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Boxed" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Full Width" Single Image
  • "Boxed" Single Image
Custom property sidebar allows you to add widgets, that only appear on the single property page. Social sharing buttons, agent information and agent contact form can be switch on/off as well.

item.title: Intro
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Realty, A Premium Real Estate Theme for WordPress. This intro page is optional. Show a fullscreen background slideshow or single image. Advanced property search on the right-hand side is fully customizable. Add, remove and order it the way you want. Also available as a shortcode and widget. Enter the site »

item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded: [alert type="success" dismissable="true"]Set Featured Image Like The One Above To Add A Top Banner To Any Page[/alert]

item.title: Featured Image
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
This post contains a few examples of how easy it is to add pretty much any content you can think of to your real estate site.

Tiled Mosaic Gallery & Fullscreen Lightbox

[gallery type="rectangular" link="none" ids="327,318,323"]

Click one of  the images ablove to open the browsable fullscreen lightbox.

Grid System

This theme is build on the very popular Bootstrap 3 framework. Create any 12 column layout you can imagine via shortcodes.
2 Columns
[row] [column md="6"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

While the two headsmen were engaged in making fast cords to his flukes, and in other ways getting the mass in readiness for towing, some conversation ensued between them.

[/column] [column md="6"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

While the two headsmen were engaged in making fast cords to his flukes, and in other ways getting the mass in readiness for towing, some conversation ensued between them.

[/column] [/row]
3 Columns
[row] [column md="4"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

[/column] [column md="4"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

[/column] [column md="4"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

[/column] [/row]
1/3 + 2/3 Column
[row] [column md="4"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

[/column] [column md="8"]

At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he turned upon his back a corpse.

[/column] [/row]

Responsive Video Embed (Fitvids)

http://vimeo.com/78472610

Quote

People don't realize that now is all there ever is; there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.Eckhart Tolle

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: <iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/78472610" width="1170" height="658" frameborder="0" title="All The Way - a Charles Bukowski poem" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: For one day longer the despatches continued to come from New York. Then they, too, ceased. The man who had sent them, perched in his lofty building, had either died of the plague or been consumed in the great conflagrations he had described as raging around him.
And this is how a nested comment looks like.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded: [section_title heading="h2"]Get In Touch[/section_title] This theme is using the popular and free Contact Form 7 plugin. Set required fields, add simple math captcha for spam protection. Create and insert as many contact forms as you need and add them anywhere on your site. Like we did in the footer widget. The contact template also has its own customizable sidebar. Contact map above is optional and can be customized straight from the Theme Option Panel. [contact-form-7 id="113" title="Contact - 2 Columns"]

item.title: Home - Property Map
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
Home Property Map Lists All Properties. Click On Property Marker Will Zoom In And Open Single Property Info Box.
The Content Below Is The Simple Result Of Two Shortcodes.

[property_search_form] [property_listing per_page="6"]

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes

All major real estate elements can easily be added to any page or post as a shortcode with a single click, straight from the text editor menu. [section_title heading="h3"]Property Listing[/section_title] Results Per Page Can Be Set To Any Number. Example Below Shows Four Results Per Page. 
[[property_listing per_page="4"]]
[property_listing per_page="4"] [section_title heading="h3"]Featured Properties[/section_title] Mark Any Property As "Featured" With A Single Click. 
[[featured_properties columns="2"]]
[featured_properties columns="2"] [section_title heading="h3"]Single Property[/section_title] Insert A Single Property Listing Anywhere On Your Site By Referencing Its Post ID. [row] [column md="6"] 
[[single_property id="297"]]
[single_property id="297"] [/column] [column md="6"] 
[[single_property id="95"]]
[single_property id="95"] [/column] [/row] [section_title heading="h3"]Agents[/section_title] Use The Following Shortcode To Introduce Your Team On Your "About" Page Or Within A Blog Post. 
[[agents columns="3"]]
[agents columns="3"] [section_title heading="h3"]Testimonials[/section_title] Testimonials Can Be Easily Created As You Would Create A Normal Blog Post. 
[[testimonials columns="2"]]
[testimonials columns="2"] [section_title heading="h3"]Property Search Form[/section_title] Fully Customizable Property Search. Add & Remove Any Search Field. 
[[property_search_form]]
[property_search_form] [section_title heading="h3"]Map[/section_title] Insert A Custom Property Map Anywhere On Your Site. Setting The Location, Zoom Level, And Map Height. 
[[map address="London, UK" zoomlevel="13" height="400px"]]
[map address="London, UK" zoomlevel="13" height="400px"]

item.title: Real Estate Widgets
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
[section_title heading="h1"]Custom Real Estate Widgets[/section_title] Besides professionally styling for all standard WordPress widgets, we have added some important real estate widgets for you:
  • Property Search (also available as a shortcode)
  • Featured Properties (also available as a shortcode)
  • Latest Posts
  • Testimonials (also available as a shortcode)
  • Featured Agent (also available as a shortcode To Showcase All Agents)
You'll find them on the right-hand side of this page. All widgets an be used in any widget area:
  • Blog Sidebar
  • Property Sidebar
  • Agent Sidebar
  • Page Sidebar
  • Contact Sidebar
  • Footer Column 1
  • Footer Column 2
  • Footer Column 3
We are eager to hear from you: What other widgets would be helpful for your real estate business? Don't hesitate and let us know, what additional widgets you'll benefit from.

item.title: Custom Property Search
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded: [section_title heading="h1"]Custom Property Search[/section_title] [row] [column md="6"] [/column] [column md="6"] Build your own advanced property search form by using only the search fields you need. All via Drag&Drop from the Theme Option Panel. The property search form is also available as a shortcode and widget. Search results can be order by date (ascending & descending), Price (ascending & descending), or Randomly. Viewable as a grid or list. [/column] [/row]

item.title: Central With Garden
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
This is an example of a single property using a boxed layout with a single property image. From the Theme Option Panel you can set the default property layout to full width or boxed. Which can be overwritten on a property basis. A click on the active property photo will open it in full screen mode.

Single Property Layouts

  • "Full Width" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Boxed" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Full Width" Single Image
  • "Boxed" Single Image
Custom property sidebar allows you to add widgets, that only appear on the single property page. Social sharing buttons, agent information and agent contact form can be switch on/off as well.

item.title: Contact - 2 Columns
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name class:form-control id:name placeholder "Name"] [email* your-email class:form-control id:email placeholder "Email"] [text your-subject class:form-control id:subject placeholder "Subject"]
[textarea your-message class:form-control id:message placeholder "Message"]
[quiz captcha "7even + 5ive = |12"] [submit class:btn class:btn-primary "Send the message"]

item.title: Contact - 1 Column
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:

Error occurred.";}
I can't speak high enough of the quality service I received from this real estate company. Everything went smoothly, and I would even say we discovered a real gem for me and my husband.
What an amazing team. I am more than please with the help I got from everyone of you. I will hire you next time for sure.
These are real estate professionals, trust me, they are worth every cent. I will keep recommending you over and over. Thank you so much.
Well, I didn't expect much when first contacting you. To say I am pleased with the results would be a huge understatement. These people have real estate in their blood.

item.title: Spacious & Bright Mansion
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
This is an example of a single property using a boxed layout with a property image slideshow. From the Theme Option Panel you can set the default property layout to full width or boxed. Which can be overwritten on a property basis. A click on the active property photo will open it in full screen mode.

Single Property Layouts

  • "Full Width" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Boxed" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Full Width" Single Image
  • "Boxed" Single Image
Custom property sidebar allows you to add widgets, that only appear on the single property page. Social sharing buttons, agent information and agent contact form can be switch on/off as well.

item.title: Living The Dream
item.dc:creator: janedoe
item.content:encoded:
This is an example of a single property using a full width layout with a property image slideshow. From the Theme Option Panel you can set the default property layout to full width or boxed. Which can be overwritten on a property basis. A click on the active property photo will open it in full screen mode.

Single Property Layouts

  • "Full Width" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Boxed" Slideshow (No Sidebar)
  • "Full Width" Single Image
  • "Boxed" Single Image
Custom property sidebar allows you to add widgets, that only appear on the single property page. Social sharing buttons, agent information and agent contact form can be switch on/off as well.
